channel.title: I donno if this is ok(global mods and what not please check)
channel.description:
can we have a chill section on the forums where we can just chat?
instead of being told we are spamming almost every 10 sconds?
if not then ok

item.title: I donno if this is ok(global mods and what not please check)
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

This has been up longer than 10 Seconds… No spam. Go on moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php and go into General Section, there you can just “chat”

Read full topic
